import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Panel.css';import{format,isSameDay}from'date-fns';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Reports=()=>{const[reports,setReports]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[selectedDate,setSelectedDate]=useState(null);const token=localStorage.getItem('token');useEffect(()=>{const fetchReports=async()=>{if(!token){setError('You must log in first.');setLoading(false);return;}try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/reports',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setReports(response.data);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching reports:',err);setError('Failed to load reports.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchReports();},[token]);const handleDateChange=e=>{setSelectedDate(e.target.value);};const handleDownload=async(id,format)=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/reports/download/${id}?format=${format}`,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`},responseType:'blob'});const url=window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]));const link=document.createElement('a');link.href=url;link.setAttribute('download',`report-${id}.${format}`);document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();document.body.removeChild(link);}catch(err){console.error('Error downloading report:',err);setError('Failed to download report.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Reports"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"date-selector",children:"Select Date:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",id:"date-selector",value:selectedDate||''// Ensure it's never null
,onChange:handleDateChange})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:reports.filter(report=>!selectedDate||isSameDay(new Date(report.date),new Date(selectedDate))).map(report=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"report-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:report.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date: ",format(new Date(report.date),'yyyy-MM-dd')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:report.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDownload(report.id,'csv'),className:"download-csv",children:"Download CSV"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDownload(report.id,'pdf'),className:"download-pdf",children:"Download PDF"})]})]},report.id))})]});};export default Reports;
